import React from 'react' import {useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function Blog(prop) { const item=prop.item const dispatch=useDispatch() console.warn(item) return (
{item.title}
{showmore ? ` ${item.description}` : `${item.description.substring(0, 50)}...`}
{item.price}
) } export default Blog
